# Timeline

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(plan)

g <- new("gantt")

# ---- Systematic literature reviews (parametric popPK) ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Protocol", "2025-09-01", "2026-01-15", done = 100)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Dalbavancin review", "2026-02-01", "2026-06-30", done = 60)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Beta-lactams review", "2026-04-01", "2026-12-31", done = 30)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Living update cycle 1", "2027-10-01", "2027-12-15", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Living update cycle 2", "2028-10-01", "2028-12-15", done = 0)

# ---- Model reconstruction & harmonization ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Reconstruct dalbavancin models", "2026-05-01", "2026-09-30", done = 20)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Reconstruct beta-lactam models", "2026-08-01", "2027-06-30", done = 0)

# ---- Shiny apps & tooling ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Shiny  UI components", "2026-06-01", "2026-10-31", done = 10)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Dalbavancin Shiny", "2026-09-01", "2027-02-28", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Beta-lactams Shiny", "2027-01-15", "2027-10-31", done = 0)

# ----External validation  ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "External validation: dalbavancin", "2027-01-01", "2027-06-30", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "External validation: beta-lactams", "2027-05-01", "2028-02-28", done = 0)

# ---- WP5: Dissemination & thesis writing ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Manuscript 1 (review)", "2026-10-01", "2027-03-31", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Manuscript 2 (external validation)", "2027-07-01", "2028-02-28", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Manuscript 3 (clinical tool + implementation)", "2028-01-01", "2028-08-31", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Thesis writing, revisions, submission", "2028-06-01", "2028-12-31", done = 0)

# ---- Plot ----
plot(
  g,
  ylabel = list(font = ifelse(is.na(g[["start"]]), 2, 1)),
  event.time  = "2027-12-31",
  event.label = "End of Year 2",
  main = "PhD Timeline (36 months): Reviews → Models → Tools → Validation → Thesis"
)

legend(
  "topright",
  pch = 22, pt.cex = 2, cex = 0.9,
  pt.bg = gray(c(0.3, 0.9)),
  border = "black",
  legend = c("Completed", "Not Yet Done"),
  bg = "white", xpd = TRUE
)
```
